name: Water It
description:
You are in a wonder garden, there are pipelines and trees as you can see, what you need to do is put the red pipelines in order so that the trees can be watered. As the purple ones are settled, you have to use your brain to solve the puzzles.

Difficulty will be increasing in each level, train your mind and challenge your intelligence with us. Now shall we begin watering?

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* Amazing background, you will feel relaxed once a puzzle is solved!
